answers.answer: Cat years from what I remember work like this;A 1 year old cat is about the age of a 7-8 year old.At 2 they're about a 17 year old. At three a 23 year old. After that, the procession is roughly 1 cat year to 4 human years. So... your cat is probably about 55-60 (I don't remember the scale above ten years but I believe it changes to about a 1 to 2 or 1 to 3 ratio.How long they can live...depends entirely on the cat and their diet (I  know, not very helpful, sorry but it's true).I will say the oldest diabetic cat I've seen was 16.

question: My daughters cat Curious is 14 years old.  He has diabetes and is very thin buthanging in there.  1. What is 14yrs in human life?  2.How long can a cat livewith diabetes?  Thank you
title: Bocelli
